VersionInfo.Title: Markdown Monster 3.9.6 is now available
VersionInfo.Detail:
Recent updates added many enhancements:
* Many Mermaid Improvements * Optional, triggered AI Completions * AI Ghost Text Suggestions * Support for Font Ligatures * Improved RegEx Find support in Editor * Mermaid, Python and C++ Inline Syntax Coloring * New Document Link Checker * Improved ARM64 support * plus [much more...](https://github.com/RickStrahl/MarkdownMonster/blob/main/Changelog.md)
